Loops¶

Writing for and while loops in PromptScript.

Loops in PromptScript function the same as in Python:

For Loops¶

for i in range(1, 11):
    show i

You can also use len:

string = "word"
for i in range(len(string)):
    show i

Or iterate through values:

string = "word"
for character in string:
    show character

While Loops¶

x = 10
while x > 0:
    show x
    x -= 1
